article_text:
How to Watch TV Without Paying a Cable or Satellite TV Bill

Ever click through all 700 HD channels on your cable or satellite service channel lineup only to announce, "Nothing's on..." with a long sigh? Here's how to watch TV the right way and save a bundle.
article_summary:
Here's how to watch TV the right way and save a bundle.
